localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
blogPost.body: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
blogPost.title: SaaSync - Integrate QuickBooks Online and Xero with ChartMogul
blogPost.author: Nick Franklin

localize.description: SaaSync从QBO或Xero检索发票和其他数据。这些数据经过转换后可用于ChartMogul。不能自动同步的数据会出现在审查屏幕上，SaaSync用户可以在将剩余数据推送到ChartMogul之前对其进行编辑。
SaaSync從QBO或Xero檢索發票和其他數據。這些數據經過轉換後可用於ChartMogul。不能自動同步的數據會出現在審查屏幕上，SaaSync用戶可以在將剩餘數據推送到ChartMogul之前對其進行編輯。

previous.excerpt: All-In-One property management and sales automation platform for independent hotels and vacation rentals. We also help our properties upsell unsold rooms and amenities in a completely automated way via guest messaging and direct sales on website.
previous.title: Stayflexi - Modern operating system for hotels and vacation rentals

localize.description: 一体化物业管理和销售自动化平台，用于独立酒店和度假租赁。我们还帮助我们的物业以完全自动化的方式，通过客人信息和网站上的直接销售，向上销售未售出的房间和设施。
localize.tagline: 现代化的酒店和度假租赁的操作系统

localize.description: 一體化物業管理和銷售自動化平臺，用於獨立酒店和度假租賃。我們還幫助我們的物業以完全自動化的方式，通過客人信息和網站上的直接銷售，向上銷售未售出的房間和設施。
localize.tagline: 現代化的酒店和度假租賃的操作系統

next.excerpt: 9 months after we initially launched on Chrome, Motion Firefox is finally here! Motion is an all-in-one time management tool that helps you get things done: by helping you maximize focus time, group meetings together, easily send availabilities, and focus.
next.title: Motion Firefox - All-in-one time management tool in Firefox

localize.description: 在我们最初在Chrome浏览器上推出9个月后，Motion Firefox终于来了! Motion是一款集所有功能于一身的时间管理工具，它可以帮助你完成任务：通过帮助你最大限度地利用焦点时间，一起召开小组会议，轻松发送空闲时间，并集中精力。
localize.tagline: 火狐中的一体化时间管理工具

localize.description: 在我們最初在Chrome瀏覽器上推出9個月後，Motion Firefox終於來了! Motion是一款集所有功能於一身的時間管理工具，它可以幫助你完成任務：通過幫助你最大限度地利用焦點時間，一起召開小組會議，輕鬆發送空閒時間，並集中精力。
localize.tagline: 火狐中的一體化時間管理工具
